title: 5 Simple Steps to Unpin Someone on Snapchat

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This the icon of the white ghost with a yellow background. [1] X Research source Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now, or create an account .

steps.title: Tap the Chat icon.
steps.content: Tap the Chat icon. This is the text box icon on the bottom toolbar, to the left of the camera. You'll see a list of all your recently messaged friends.

steps.title: Tap and hold on a friend's name.
steps.content: Tap and hold on a friend's name. A pop-up menu will open. When you pin someone on Snapchat, a red push pin will be visible on the right side of their name. You can also reach this menu by tapping a friend's profile icon, then tapping the three dots icon in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Chat Settings.
steps.content: Tap Chat Settings . You'll be taken to more settings.

steps.title: Tap Unpin Conversation.
steps.content: Tap Unpin Conversation . The red push pin will be removed, and the conversation with the user will be unpinned. If the conversation is the most recent, it will still appear at the top. To pin someone again, follow the previous steps and tap Pin Conversation . Keeping friends pinned is a great way to increase your Snapchat score as this allows you quick access to Snaps.
